body:
Comment 4: 
> go tool dist: FAILED: cmd.exe /c hg identify -b

Show us the error message. There must be an explanation of why "cmd.exe /c hg identify
-b" failed.

> ... I use clink normally - cmd.exe replacement

Well maybe clink is not equal to cmd.exe. You need to understand how they are different.
Perhaps, we can accommodate. Otherwise you must use standard cmd.exe.

Alex
